title: R.I.P Nipsey Hussle
itunes:title: R.I.P Nipsey Hussle
description:
April Fools has been cancelled, after news broke that we lost a black king Nipsey Hussle the day before. Moreover, we flashed back to the time Nipsey Hussle stopped by. Furthermore, on a lighter note, but definitely on a more touchy note, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day"  to Omari Hardwick for getting a little too close to Beyonce when greeting her. We even opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners think there is a certain type of etiquette to go by when greeting your friends girlfriend or wife.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
April Fools has been cancelled, after news broke that we lost a black king Nipsey Hussle the day before. Moreover, we flashed back to the time Nipsey Hussle stopped by. Furthermore, on a lighter note, but definitely on a more touchy note, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day"  to Omari Hardwick for getting a little too close to Beyonce when greeting her. We even opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners think there is a certain type of etiquette to go by when greeting your friends girlfriend or wife.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts
